name: Spinach Artichoke Mac & Cheese 🥗
description: This spinach artichoke mac and cheese is a cheesy and comforting twist on a classic dish. With tender macaroni, creamy cheese sauce, and a tangy spinach and artichoke dip, this dish is sure to be a crowd-pleaser. Try it today for a delicious and indulgent meal.
instructions: In a large pan, melt the butter. Add garlic, and spinach cooking until spinach is wilted. Add artichoke hearts.
Slowly add the milk, salt, and pepper. Stir until milk is boiling.
Add the macaroni, cooking until the milk coats the macaroni like a glaze.
Add the cheddar and 2 cups (200g) of mozzarella, stirring until the cheese is completely melted.
Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella on top.
Bake for 7 minutes, until cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
